mapper.insert: insert ingore into success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone) values (#{seckillId}.#{userPhone})
mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, sk.seckill_id "sckill.seckill_id", s.name "sckill.name", s.number "sckill.number", s.start_time "sckill.start_time", s.end_time "sckill.end_time", s.create_time "sckill.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
